# TicTacToeApp - Project Setup Guide

## Project Overview
- **Project Type**: React Native with Expo
- **Platforms**: iOS, Android, Web
- **Purpose**: Cross-platform Tic Tac Toe game
- **Main Entry**: App.js (main game component)

## Setup Status

- [x] Create copilot-instructions.md file
- [x] Clarify Project Requirements
- [x] Scaffold the Project
- [x] Install Dependencies
- [x] Create and Run Task
- [x] Launch the Project - Ready to Start
- [x] Complete Documentation

## Project Structure

- `App.js` - Main game component with game logic
- `app.json` - Expo configuration for iOS/Android/Web
- `package.json` - Dependencies and npm scripts
- `babel.config.js` - Babel transpilation setup
- `jest.config.js` - Testing configuration
- `assets/` - App icons and splash screens (placeholders needed)

## Running the App

```bash
npm install              # Install dependencies
npm start                # Start Expo server
npm run ios              # Run on iOS (macOS only)
npm run android          # Run on Android
npm run web              # Run on web browser
```
